amendatorysection.chaptername: Decedents' Estates; Protection of Persons and Property
amendatorysection.para: For purposes of the Public Guardianship Act:
(1) Council means the Advisory Council on Public Guardianship;
(2) Office means the Office of Public Guardian;
(5) Protected person is as defined in section 30-2601;
(6) Public Guardian means the director of the office;

(7) Successor conservator means an individual or a corporation with general power to serve as trustee who is recruited by the office to become a conservator for a protected person previously served by the office;
(8) Successor guardian means a person or entity who is recruited by the office to become a guardian for a ward previously served by the office; and
(9) Ward is as defined in section 30-2601.
